evidence.text: Person B: Janusz, your presence made him so happy.
Person B: Well, thank God, that’s something. What did you do?

Person B: Janusz, Janusz, I’m sorry I don’t have time to hear your confession. There is so much still to do.
Person B: Promised who?
Person A: Cardinal Tremblay.
Person B: Janusz, the doors close soon and you’ll have to leave. Now if you promised Father Tremblay then perhaps it isn’t right for you to...

Person A: No, Your Eminence. The Holy Father told me about it afterwards, when we had supper.
Person B: Why hasn’t he mentioned anything to me? He was there in the apartment with us the night the Holy Father died.
